content: The touch points 1 and 3 of the track have been misconfigured in Whova. They were supposed to be at midnight (12 AM) US Central time, but are configured at noon (12 PM). It's OK for me to check in at both times, but be aware that this is the case.

I'm online for the "midnight version" of the checkpoint 4.
I can't see it in Whova. But you can use the "noon version" to join in.
Actually, I do see it in the browser version of Whova, just not in the mobile app.
